meanings.definition: Unable to be recovered or regained.
meanings.sent3: The misplaced keys were irretrievable until they were found in the fridge.
meanings.sent5: The sunken ship was irretrievable from the depths of the ocean.

meanings.sent3: The burnt toast was irretrievable, but at least the fire alarm worked.
meanings.sent5: The broken mirror was irretrievable, reflecting only fragments of the past.
